duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute technical strategies for the development of new product programs in the medical technology field.
Lead and manage a team of engineers, designers, and technicians for product design and development projects.
Collaborate with cross-functional leaders to plan and support business initiatives and technology development.
Participate in regular meetings to resolve issues, communicate technical updates, and coordinate with project managers to manage resources and tasks.
Partner with marketing for new product ideas and sustain engineering support for current products.
Ensure project compliance with regulatory requirements and oversee R&D activities to governing standards.
Interface with external partners for component product and process design.
Participate in budgeting and assist program managers with project cost estimation.
Recruit, hire, and develop R&D staff, providing mentorship and guidance.
Perform all other essential duties as directed.

education_certification.credential: B.S. in Engineering (Mechanical or Biomedical preferred) or equivalent experience. Master's preferred.
